SmoothMoves 2D Skeletal Animation Editor
for use with Unity3D

Copyright 2012 - 2015 echo17


IMPORTANT -- READ FIRST !!!!


!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
!!!!!!!                                                                    !!!!!!!
!!!!!!! ALWAYS BACKUP YOUR CODE BEFORE IMPORTING NEW SMOOTHMOVES VERSIONS. !!!!!!!
!!!!!!! Please rebuild your animations after upgrading SmoothMoves.        !!!!!!!
!!!!!!!                                                                    !!!!!!!
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

For a complete history of the changes to this plugin, please check the ChangeLog here:

http://www.echo17.com/forum/index.php?topic=2.0



!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
!!                                                                               !!
!! 
Before you can run the Rise of the Dough mini game, you will need to import   !!
!! the Unity package file "RiseOfTheDough_ProjectSettings" from the "Rise of the !! 
!! Dough" folder. You can do this by going to the menu at the top of Unity       !!
!! "Assets > Import Package > Custom Package".                                   !!
!!                                                                               !!
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
